mapper.select: SELECT BOARD_CODE "boardCode", BOARD_NAME "boardName" FROM "BOARD_TYPE" ORDER BY BOARD_CODE
SELECT SPORTS_CODE "sportsCode", SPORTS_KR_NAME "sportsKrName", IMG_PATH "imgPath", IMG_NAME "imgName" FROM "SPORTS_TYPE" ORDER BY SPORTS_NO

SELECT BOARD_NO, BOARD_TITLE, MEMBER_NICKNAME, MEETING_DATE, MEETING_LOCATION,
(SELECT IMG_PATH || IMG_RENAME FROM "BOARD_IMG" C WHERE C.BOARD_NO = B.BOARD_NO) THUMBNAIL,
(SELECT COUNT(*) FROM "ATTEND_MEMBER" A WHERE A.BOARD_NO = B.BOARD_NO) ATTEND_MEMBER,
CASE WHEN SYSDATE - BOARD_WRITE_DATE < 1 / 24 / 60 THEN FLOOR((SYSDATE - BOARD_WRITE_DATE) * 24 * 60 * 60) || '초 전'
WHEN SYSDATE - BOARD_WRITE_DATE < 1 / 24 THEN FLOOR((SYSDATE - BOARD_WRITE_DATE) * 24 * 60) || '분 전'
WHEN SYSDATE - BOARD_WRITE_DATE < 1 THEN FLOOR((SYSDATE - BOARD_WRITE_DATE) * 24) || '시간 전'
ELSE TO_CHAR(BOARD_WRITE_DATE, 'YYYY-MM-DD') END "BOARD_WRITE_DATE"
FROM "BOARD" B JOIN "MEMBER" USING(MEMBER_NO) WHERE BOARD_DEL_FL = 'N' AND BOARD_CODE = 1 AND ROWNUM <= 4 ORDER BY BOARD_NO DESC

SELECT BOARD_NO, BOARD_TITLE, MEMBER_NICKNAME,
CASE WHEN SYSDATE - BOARD_WRITE_DATE < 1 / 24 / 60 THEN FLOOR((SYSDATE - BOARD_WRITE_DATE) * 24 * 60 * 60) || '초 전'
WHEN SYSDATE - BOARD_WRITE_DATE < 1 / 24 THEN FLOOR((SYSDATE - BOARD_WRITE_DATE) * 24 * 60) || '분 전'
WHEN SYSDATE - BOARD_WRITE_DATE < 1 THEN FLOOR((SYSDATE - BOARD_WRITE_DATE) * 24) || '시간 전'
ELSE TO_CHAR(BOARD_WRITE_DATE, 'YYYY-MM-DD') END "BOARD_WRITE_DATE"
FROM "BOARD" B JOIN "MEMBER" USING(MEMBER_NO) WHERE BOARD_DEL_FL = 'N' AND BOARD_CODE = 2 AND ROWNUM <= 5 ORDER BY BOARD_NO DESC
